EmailTemplate.subject: 1/10/19 Webinar - Why Your Digital Transformation Strategy Demands Middleware Modernization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us for the webinar Why Your Digital Transformation Strategy Demands Middleware Modernization <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jan-10-why-your-digital-transformation-strategy-demands-middleware-modernization-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=dts-middlemod-perficient&utm_term=q119]]>, on January 10, 2019.
Your current middleware platforms are costing you more than you think. They weren’t designed to support high-velocity software releases and frequent iteration of applications—prerequisites for success in today’s world. A new, modern approach to middleware is needed that enables both developer productivity and operational efficiency. Join Pivotal’s Rohit Kelapure and Perficient’s Joel Thimsen as they discuss:
- The limitations of traditional middleware
- The benefits of middleware modernization
- Your options for modernization, including a cloud-native platform
- Tips for overcoming some common challenges
Presenters: Rohit Kelapure, Pivotal Joel Thimsen, Perficient Jeff Kelly, Pivotal (Moderator)
Date: Thursday, January 10, 2019 Time: 10:00am PST / 1:00pm EST
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jan-10-why-your-digital-transformation-strategy-demands-middleware-modernization-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=dts-middlemod-perficient&utm_term=q119]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
